title: GTA I Classic
description:
--------------------------------------
GTA - README FIRST!
--------------------------------------


WARNING
--------------
This version of GTA is modified from its original version to enable support for modern PC's
and current Microsoft Windows(R) platforms. However, we unfortunately cannot guarantee that
GTA will work correctly on your PC. Installation and execution of this software is entirely
at your own risk.


INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS
--------------------------------------------------

- After downloading GTA, double-click on the file "GTAINSTALLER.EXE".

- The program will ask you to extract the install files to a temporary folder.

- Once you have chosen a folder to extract to and the files are extracted,
  the GTA setup should automatically start (If not, double-click "SETUP.EXE").

- The Install program will start, follow the on-screen install instructions and
  choose where you would like to install GTA to.

- GTA will then be installed and a program group created for you in
  "START > PROGRAMS > Rockstar Games > GTA" by default.

- You will NEED to run "GTA Settings" from the Program Menu BEFORE running the
  game for the first time.

- In GTA Settings you can customize your control options and select a language
  (English is default).

- Once you are done with GTA settings, choose "Save" to save your settings.

- You can now run GTA! Just click on 
  "START > PROGRAMS > Rockstar Games > GTA > GRAND THEFT AUTO" to start.

- Once in-game you can change the resolution by pressing 'F11' and by choosing
  any of the listed resolutions.

- For Multiplayer action choose "Internet TCP/IP connection for Directplay"
  from the in-game menu.

- Have Fun!


Just uploading. I'm not the author
